title: About
text:
Hey!
Thanks for stopping by!
I am Srishti Ramanathan, currently pursuing my PhD in cardiac genomics and mechanisms of heart failure at the Sahlgrenska Hospital, University of Gothenburg, Sweden. I graduated with a master’s degree in molecular and cellular biology from the University of Munich and a bachelor’s degree par distinction in Biomedical Sciences (Hons.) with a specialization in human genetics.
